betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oBotania is a magic (technology) mod focused on mana and flowers.

It has its own magic energy system called mana, and it provides lots of quality-of-life, materials, and boss fights. 

These quests will walk you through the progression for this mod, and for its addon ExtraBotany.

The mod is almost fully automatable by itself, and the pack adds a custom multiblock to supply what's missing in the base mod.
